short_summary: CISCO or Equivalent for the Department of National Defence
description: CISCO or Equivalent for the Department of National Defence, SSC CISCO or Equivalent for the Department of National Defence- Amendment 001.
full_summary:
Proposal Solicitation Notice
=========================

Shared Services Canada invites bids for a CISCO Contract.
-----------------------------------------------

### Contract Details

*   **Title**: CISCO or Equivalent for the Department of National Defence
*   **Reference Number**: SSC-22-00021099:T
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Solicitation Number**: BPM017632/21099

### Tender Information

*   **Publication Date**: December 12, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: January 10, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST
*   **Amendment Date**: December 21, 2022

### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

### Contract Requirements

*   Goods and services are required for a CISCO Contract for the Department of National Defence. Bidders must provide a CISCO solution that meets the specific needs of the department.
*   The contract includes the following requirements:
    *   ADP Central Processing Unit (CPU)
    *   Digital ADP Software
    *   Cisco Solution

### Contract Timeline

*   There is no expected contract start date or end date specified in the tender notice.

### Submission Information

*   Tenders must be submitted electronically on the Shared Services Canada procurement portal.
*   A response to this solicitation document is required with all bids.
*   More information about the tender can be found on the procurement portal.

### Contact Information

*   For more information, please contact:
    *   Eleanor, Cesare
    *   Email: [eleanor.cesare@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:eleanor.cesare@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: 613-219-8366
    *   Fax: 613-960-6026

### Document Attachments

*   The following documents must be reviewed before bidding:
    *   [List of attachments provided in the original document]([https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/*](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/*))
